Something else caught Pegasus' eye.  He galloped as fast as he could and
came upon Rampage and Annihilator battling.

His memory circuits confirmed that one of the fighters was Rampage, a.k.a.
Protoform X, a Maximal protoform that had an immortal spark.  Unfortunately,
the spark drove him insane.  Now, he was a Predacon.

Pegasus knew that Rampage was a loose cannon and had to stop him.

~I have to get my head reconfigured for doing this,~ he thought.  "Pegasus,
maximize!"  Pegasus transformed and fired his partical beam weapon.
----- Original Message -----

Subject: Re: bounty hunters for hire


> Rampage turns to Annihilator and goes for the tackle
